name: Lisa Gibson
text: We ordered four large stuffed crust pizzas and all four had little to no sauce in the center to about 2/3 of the way up. It did have sauce near the crust. Sauce is what makes the pizza. It was basically cheese bread. Very dry. I am adding a picture where I peeled the toppings back at the bottom right.

name: NWG Hotspur
text: all i wanted was pizza, and they're closed.

name: Darlene Stevenson
text: It was the cleanest I have ever seen this restaurant; the tables, the floor, even the restrooms. The buffet and salad bar were fresh. Hot pizzas from the oven. ..very very good.

name: Megan Bivens
text: Had a great lunch. Had lots of different pizzas. Had a great nice time. The service was great.

name: Melissa Beal
text: Pizza hut made a mistake when they changed their recipes about 25 yrs ago. They need to go back to the original.

name: Vicki Rodgers
text: Love Pizza Hut pizza! Called in an order to share with a friend after her surgery. Placed an order & the employee told me there was a better deal. There was, I took it & returned today with grandkids to do it again!

name: Erin Witzel
text: Ordered my pizza 45 minutes ago and still hasn‚Äôt arrived. When I called to check on it the guy was super rude and hung up  while I was still giving directions to my house.

name: Michael Wood
text: The pizza was really good my friend and I had the buffet and when we arrived they were putting out fresh food and just kept it coming .

name: Rosetta Lynn Bryan
text: They were nice and they provided great service and it was clean

name: Jay Phillips
text: Had just finally realize I will not have pizza Hut again. Not even worth the hassle.

name: Papa Bear
text: It was a good meal.  Restaurant was clean and the food was hot.

name: George Running
text: Nice. Clean. Food was good

name: Johnny Simpson
text: It was good and the service was great.

name: shirlene groves
text: Pizza is always great and service is always good

name: Ericka Ruiz
text: Pizza was good up until we saw a hair cooked in one of the slices. Waitress was apologetic and manager gave us meal for free. Simple way to avoid this would be wearing a hair net which no one did.

name: Mary Loss
text: 20 dollar box... Yummy

name: Katie Koduvalil
text: Service was meh as usual. It reminded me of why we don't eat there often. I love the food though.

name: Nancy Harris
text: The restroom doors aren't even wide enough for my mom's walker!  These doors are much narrower than standard doors.  We had to go elsewhere.  Food was good.  Staff was nice.

name: Spencer Heffron
text: Its honestly a toss up with this place. It can be good, but it also can be awful. Its really good when I'm drunk and the next morning when I need to wash down some OJ with a nice fat piece of bread jammed with cheese.

name: Nicole Howes
text: Buffet wasn't bad. Pretty clean, workers were pleasant, didn't cost every much.

name: Kmb Motorsports
text: Good food at a fair price

name: Jeremy Bryant
text: Great food service was good, busy.. the poor hostess needed someone to help her with the dining room during the dinner rush.

name: Linda Stein
text: Not as good today as in our past visits! But the manager was very helpful so we know the next time to ask for our favorite pizza when we come in for the buffet. Also we found out you can request something if they are out of it during the buffet hours. We will eat there again soon.

name: Joseph Hawkins
text: Very good place to eat and I visit this place quite frequently so I would recommend it very highly the little bit high but just for a change in pizzas and things that it's worth it it's worth it

name: Cheryl Stackhouse
text: The pizza was excellent.  Best pizza hut pizza I have had.  The waitress was very polite and helpful.  I would definitely recommend this pizza hut.

name: Elizabeth Grote
text: Ready when they said.

name: Mike War
text: Great pizza and service, waitress was great

name: Don Cooper
text: In for buffet  only had a few pieces of pizza out  it sat on the counter too long. Some of it was cold. We even had to get their attention when we needed refills

name: Dustin Jackson
text: Cheap pizza and polite employees. I love Pizza Hut, and the experience was pretty good overall.

name: Jon Urshan
text: Pizza is super good and very fattening. Which is why I love it so much. Stuffed crest pizza is the best.

name: Jessica Marshall
text: My kids love their pizza and staff was very nice and welcoming. üëç

name: Dwayne Ramey
text: Not near as nice and as good as it used to be

name: Rachel Mitchell
text: The staff is really nice and I like to be able to order pizza online and pick up at the drive thru.

name: Constance Johnson
text: The pizza was hot and fresh.  I did a pick up and was pleased.

name: Larry Stanton
text: I would buy a frozen pizza before ordering at this one. Even if you love Pizza Hut, just give Centralia a chance they will change your mind...keep driving and find a place that tastes decent and has decent service. Centralia is lacking in both.

name: Samantha Jolliff
text: Cheap friendly service and tasty food!

name: Rachelle Buehne
text: My food is always cold when it gets here. I've complained several times and it doesn't get better.

name: Trista Oettle
text: I don't know your name, but my pizza tonight was the best hands down pizza I Ever had from pizza hut. I only live a block away üòâ and I will definitely be returning!! Thanks so much!!!

name: Isaac Niermann
text: Very good pizza thick or thin crust good personnel pan pizzas you can oder delivery or take out and dine in the smell in there is great and fast enough service.

name: Ellen Boyce
text: The workers are nice the food is great

name: Trisha Briggs
text: Although I hate to admit it, my family orders delivery about once a week. The food is always hot, and they always get the order right. Our last order was on a Saturday night, and it was about 25 minutes late; I didn't even complain, but got an email the next day with an apology and a free large pizza.

name: kevin
text: It's great
